pr_title: Fall back to user.dir / cwd as frontend build base directory only if it is a project directory

timeline.message: Fall back to user.dir / cwd as frontend build base directory only if it is a project directory
Apply Sonar suggestion to not use NIO for file existence for JDK8 performance issues

timeline.bodyText: Could we simplify this by placing getBaseDirectoryFallback() directly as a second parameter of method instead of null?
timeline.author: mshabarov

replies.bodyText: No. getBaseDirectoryFallback() should be evaluated lazily, as it throws on failure.
replies.author: joheriks

timeline.bodyText: I propose to explicitly add the mention of flow-build-info.json: "... prepare-frontend Maven goal which generates 'flow-build-info.json' file prior to deploying ..."
timeline.author: mshabarov

timeline.bodyText: Let's add the gradle case as well
timeline.author: mshabarov
